Title: Play Midi Music
Description: A very simple example with only one MidiFilePlayer prefab to play Midi music. An example of integration without any scripting.

Title: Play Midi with script
Description: How to integrate MPTK by script in your application. Use of the MPTK API with a few lines of code. Use of the MPTK API.

Title: Multi Midi Player
Description: Four MidiFilePlayer prefabs are defined on a scene with the camera moving on each to experiment the "Playing on distance" function.

Title: Simple Midi Stream Music
Description: How to generate music without any Midi files with a few lines of code.

Title: Catch Music
Description: Midi is read from a MidiFilePlayer but playing music is delayed in time. Could become a game!

Title: Infinity Music
Description: Music is generated with some algorithms. Could become a more complex application to generate music.

Title: Midi Play List
Description: Demonstration of the prefab MidiListPlayer able to play a list of Midi files

Title: Write Midi File
Description: Four methods to create and write a Midi file with MPTK. Contains also a light music sequencer.

Title: Play External Midi
Description: Select Midi file from your desktop or from a Web site and play
